Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Resources/root
Synopsis Retrieve a full hierarchical representation of all resources in the Eclipse workspace.
Function Resource root()
Examples 
rascal>import util::Resources;
ok
rascal>root();
Resource: root({
    project(
      |project://myRascal|,
      {
        folder(
          |project://myRascal/std|,
          {
            file(|project://myRascal/std/Map.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/IO.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/ValueIO.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/Node.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/SourceHierarchy.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/Time.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/Number.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/FileSystem.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/TopologicalStrategy.rsc|),
            file(|project://myRascal/std/Set.rsc|),

              |project://myRascal/std/.svn|,
              {
                folder(

                  {}),
